text: Answer each question according to the way you personally feel, using the following scales:

How confident are you in your ability to do arithmetic?
(0 = not at all, 100 = extremely)

How much do you enjoy arithmetic?
(0 = not at all, 100 = extremely)

How happy or sad are you feeling?
(0 = extremely sad, 50 = neutral, 100 = extremely happy)
